short_summary: 5 Mac M1 Ultra workstations or equivalent
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) / AVIS DE PROJET DE MARCHÉ (APM) Solicitation No. 2BH2130977/ADepartment: Royal Military College of Canada Notification Period: 10 days (25/01/2023 to 03/02/2023) Description of Requirement: The Department of National Defense’s, Royal Military College of Canada(RMC) has a requirement for the supply of five (5) Mac M1 Ultra workstations or equivalent as per the Statement of Requirement and the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation. Delivery Destination Area: Kingston, Ontario Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award. Security Requirements: N/A Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA): N/A The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
